Header:
This Minerva Story is of LSP19967, a slide with tissue from a patient with head & neck cancer.

A microdevice was inserted into the tumor, and the rectangle on the left denotes tissue from level 3 of the device whereas the rectangle on the right denotes level 4.

Waypoints.Name: Introduction
Waypoints.Description:
This Minerva Story is of LSP19967, a slide with tissue from a patient with head & neck cancer.

A microdevice was inserted into the tumor, and the rectangle on the left denotes tissue from level 3 of the device whereas the rectangle on the right denotes level 4.

Waypoints.Name: Cell Populations
Waypoints.Description: This set of markers shows different cell populations -- Keratin+ epithelial cells in yellow, CD31+ endothelial cells in red, and CD45+ immune cells in green.

Waypoints.Name: Cell States
Waypoints.Description: This set of markers shows different cell states, with Ki67+ proliferating cells in magenta and gH2AX+ cells with DNA damage in green.
